archimate:BusinessService.name: Correspondence New
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Internal Business Service that allows users to send written communication to customer
Human Actors (Roles & responsibilities): Departments: Operations Financial Advisors
Roles: Writer – can request, customize and approve customer communication
System Actors (Roles & responsibilities): Requesting System – system requesting communication Calculation Engine – performs calculation of Financial Plan Web Portal – portal where HTML is stored and accessible Data Warehouse – provides customer data on demand Archive – system that stores produced communication for later use Email Gateway – system that delivers emails to customers Inspire Scaler – orchestrates communication generation and delivery Inspire Interactive – allows Writer to customize communication
